sentence: Governor Brian Kemp said on Twitter Friday he looked forward to signing the bill, "fulfilling another promise I made to the voters of this state."
author: Jake Thomas
title: Georgians Closer to Carrying Concealed Guns Without License

title: Georgia Senate gives final approval to permit-less carry gun bill
